pullrequest.title: Rename top-level files/directories from sdf to sdformat

content.raw:
Yes, one release cycle means the next prerelease of Gazebo 1.9.x.  I'm trying to avoid the need for simultaneous releases.

But your comment did make me change my mind on having this rename bump to 1.5.0.  I've retargeted it to `sdf_1.4`.  I figure that the entire 1.4.x series is pretty much experimental.
content.html:
Yes, one release cycle means the next prerelease of Gazebo 1.9.x. I'm trying to avoid the need for simultaneous releases.

But your comment did make me change my mind on having this rename bump to 1.5.0. I've retargeted it to sdf_1.4. I figure that the entire 1.4.x series is pretty much experimental.
